statements: SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE contact_person IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC, email ASC, phone_number
SELECT client_name, contact_person FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT client_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_name ILIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM client_projects;
SELECT project_id, client_name, start_date FROM client_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, project_description FROM client_projects WHERE project_id=3;
SELECT project_id, client_name, project_description FROM client_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM recipe_development WHERE recipe_type='Dessert';
SELECT project_id, client_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM client_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, client_name, start_date, end_date, project_description FROM client_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, project_id, project_description FROM client_projects WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT chef_name, recipe_name, recipe_description, recipe_type FROM recipe_development WHERE recipe_type = 'Italian' ORDER BY chef_name, recipe_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_development WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Pasta%' AND chef_name = 'Michael' ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, project_count FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE client_id = 2 ORDER BY project_deadline DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_progress FROM recipes WHERE project_id = 3 AND recipe_progress >= 0.5;
SELECT client_name, project_count FROM clients WHERE project_count > 0 ORDER BY project_count DESC, client_id ASC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, project_count FROM clients WHERE project_count > 5 ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY project_deadline DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, recipe_progress FROM recipes WHERE recipe_progress < 0.5 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC, recipe_progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients JOIN projects ON clients.client_id = projects.client_id WHERE project_status = 'Completed';
SELECT AVG(project_count) AS avg_project_count FROM clients;
SELECT project_id, project_name, client_name, start_date, end_date FROM client_projects;
SELECT client_name, project_name, end_date, start_date, project_id FROM client_projects;
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, time_to_develop, ingredients FROM recipe_development;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, publication_date FROM industry_trends;
SELECT client_name, contact_name, industry, email FROM clients;
SELECT project_name, client_name, start_date, end_date FROM client_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM recipe_development WHERE chef_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY time_to_develop ASC
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM industry_trends WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT client_name, contact_name, industry FROM clients WHERE industry = 'Technology' AND email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT project_name, client_name, start_date, end_date FROM client_projects WHERE client_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ClientProjects;
SELECT project_id, client_name, start_date FROM ClientProjects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT chef_name, recipe_name, instructions FROM RecipeDevelopment ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, project_id, rating FROM ClientFeedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM IndustryTrends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ClientProjects;
SELECT project_id, client_name, start_date FROM ClientProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) as avg_rating, project_id FROM ClientFeedback GROUP BY project_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT e.employee_name, c.client_name, e.department FROM Employees e JOIN ClientProjects c ON e.employee_id = c.project_id;
SELECT r.recipe_name, r.ingredients, f.feedback FROM RecipeDevelopment r LEFT JOIN ClientFeedback f ON r.recipe_id = f.project_id;
